title: "CEVA, LG to Bring Intelligent Vision Processing to Smart Home Appliances"
excerpt: "CEVA, the leading licensor of wireless connectivity and smart sensing technologies and co-creation solutions, announced that LG Electronics (LG) has licensed and deployed the CEVA-XM4 intelligent vision DSP in its Edge AI system-on-chip (SoC) 'LG8111' to advance the user experience of a new generation of smart home appliances."
